mapper.insert: insert into reply(rId,bId,rContent,rName,rGroup,rStep,rIndent) values (rId.nextval,#{bId},#{rContent},#{rName},(select rGroup from reply where rId=#{rId}),#{rStep},#{rIndent})
mapper.update: update reply set rStep=rStep+1 where rGroup=#{rGroup} and rStep>#{rStep}
update reply set rContent=#{rContent}, rUpdateTime=SYSDATE where rId=#{rId}
mapper.delete: update reply set rDelete='Y' where rId=#{rId}
mapper.select: select * from reply where bId=#{bId} and rDelete='N' order by rGroup asc,rStep asc offset (#{pm.page}-1)*#{pm.perPageNum} rows fetch next #{pm.perPageNum} rows only
select count (rId) from reply where bId=#{bId} and rDelete='N'
